sourceMeaningMnemonic: If you want to have your <radical>wedding</radical> in a <radical>car</radical> you're going to need a lot of <kanji>help</kanji>. Cars are pretty small compared to weddings, so if you don't get help from everyone you know you won't be able to pull it off.
meaningInfo: Picture all of your close friends coming to help you squeeze everything for the wedding into your car.
readingMnemonic: You can't just ask for <kanji>help</kanji> on the day of the wedding, either. You have to <reading>sche</reading>dule (<ja>すけ</ja>) getting your friends' help ahead of time. They might have pretty tight schedules too, so make sure you plan early!
readingInfo: Imagine calling all your friends and scheduling when you will get their help. Make sure you have your day planner ready!
